Uses of Interface
com.simsilica.lemur.anim.Tween

  • Packages that use Tween 
    Package Description
    com.simsilica.lemur.anim  

    • Uses of Tween in com.simsilica.lemur.anim

      Classes in com.simsilica.lemur.anim that implement Tween 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractTween
      Base implementation of the Tween interface that provides default implementations of the getLength() and interopolate() methods that provide common tween clamping and bounds checking.
      Methods in com.simsilica.lemur.anim that return Tween 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Tween SpatialTweens.attach(com.jme3.scene.Spatial target, com.jme3.scene.Spatial parent)
      Creates a Tween that will attach the specified spatial to the specified parent when executed with any value of t greater than or equal to 0.
      static Tween Tweens.callMethod(java.lang.Object target, java.lang.String method, java.lang.Object... args)
      Creates a Tween that will call the specified method and optional arguments whenever supplied a time value greater than or equal to 0.
      static Tween Tweens.callTweenMethod(double length, java.lang.Object target, java.lang.String method, java.lang.Object... args)
      Creates a Tween that will call the specified method and optional arguments, including the time value scaled between 0 and 1.
      static Tween Tweens.delay(double length)
      Creates a tween that will perform a no-op until the length has expired.
      static Tween SpatialTweens.detach(com.jme3.scene.Spatial target)
      Creates a Tween that will detach the specified spatial when executed with any value of t greater than or equal to 0.
      static Tween PanelTweens.fade(Panel target, java.lang.Float fromAlpha, java.lang.Float toAlpha, double length)
      Returns a tween object that will interpolate the alpha value of a panel between to supplied values.
      static Tween SpatialTweens.move(com.jme3.scene.Spatial target, com.jme3.math.Vector3f from, com.jme3.math.Vector3f to)
      Creates a tween that will interpolate the location of the specified target from one location to another.
      static Tween SpatialTweens.move(com.jme3.scene.Spatial target, com.jme3.math.Vector3f from, com.jme3.math.Vector3f to, double length)
      Creates a tween that will interpolate the location of the specified target from one location to another.
      static Tween Tweens.parallel(Tween... delegates)
      Creates a tween that will interpolate over an entire list of tweens in parallel, ie: all tweens will be run at the same time.
      static Tween SpatialTweens.rotate(com.jme3.scene.Spatial target, com.jme3.math.Quaternion from, com.jme3.math.Quaternion to, double length)
      Creates a tween that will interpolate the rotation of the specified target from one rotation to another.
      static Tween SpatialTweens.scale(com.jme3.scene.Spatial target, float from, float to, double length)
      Creates a tween that will interpolate the overall scale of the specified target from one scale to another.
      static Tween SpatialTweens.scale(com.jme3.scene.Spatial target, com.jme3.math.Vector3f from, com.jme3.math.Vector3f to, double length)
      Creates a tween that will interpolate the scale of the specified target from one scale to another.
      static Tween Tweens.sequence(Tween... delegates)
      Creates a tween that will interpolate over an entire sequence of tweens in order.
      static Tween Tweens.sineStep(Tween... delegates)
      Creates a tween that uses a sine function to smooth step the time value for the specified delegate tween or tweens.
      static Tween Tweens.smoothStep(Tween... delegates)
      Creates a tween that uses a hermite function to smooth step the time value for the specified delegate tween or tweens.
      static Tween Tweens.stretch(double desiredLength, Tween... delegates)
      Creates a tween that scales the specified delegate tween or tweens to the desired length.
      Methods in com.simsilica.lemur.anim with parameters of type Tween 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TweenAnimation AnimationState.add(Tween... sequence)
      Creates a TweenAnimation from the specified tween or tweens.
      static Tween Tweens.parallel(Tween... delegates)
      Creates a tween that will interpolate over an entire list of tweens in parallel, ie: all tweens will be run at the same time.
      static Tween Tweens.sequence(Tween... delegates)
      Creates a tween that will interpolate over an entire sequence of tweens in order.
      static Tween Tweens.sineStep(Tween... delegates)
      Creates a tween that uses a sine function to smooth step the time value for the specified delegate tween or tweens.
      static Tween Tweens.smoothStep(Tween... delegates)
      Creates a tween that uses a hermite function to smooth step the time value for the specified delegate tween or tweens.
      static Tween Tweens.stretch(double desiredLength, Tween... delegates)
      Creates a tween that scales the specified delegate tween or tweens to the desired length.
      Constructors in com.simsilica.lemur.anim with parameters of type Tween 
      Constructor and Description

      TweenAnimation(Tween... delegates)
